website_summaries.verdict: Extremely tough hex bar that can hold weights up to 750 pounds. Uses knurled handles for the most secure grip.
pros: Should accommodate all Olympic-style weight plates with 2-inch center holes
Extremely durable type of hex bar, meaning you'll receive a good value over time
Has sturdy welds that highlight the excellent build quality you'll find in this hex bar
cons: A little shorter than some others with handles 22.5 inches on center

customer_reviews.title: The welds on the bar are very good. The feel and construction of this bar is ...
customer_reviews.text: The hex bar arrived well packaged. The welds on the bar are very good. The feel and construction of this bar is excellent. My biggest complaint about this bar is the chrome finish. Right out of the box the finish has started peeling and flaking off like it has an extreme case DANDRUFF. So far there is a big one inch flake of chrome missing from the bar. There are little specs of chrome from this bar on the rubber floor mats in my home gym. Not to happy about that.
customer_reviews.author: Nathaniel Richardson

customer_reviews.title: Headache to get, but is a great piece.
customer_reviews.text: The two stars is for the shipping. It arrived just shy of a week late, the box was completely trashed, half of it was missing like it fell out of the truck and nobody had an explanation. Came with scuffs and only one side was bubble wrapped. The product itself is good. Heavy, good thick welds, knurling is almost TOO aggressive. To the point where too much weight will tear up your hands, but I'd rather have something to wear down than something that feels like it's been heavily used already. Don't leave it in the sun if you work out outside, the knurling chewing your skin up won't feel too good when you're touching something searing hot.
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: A LIFE TIME COMPANION!
customer_reviews.text: When I reach 70 years old, I will write another review with this Hex/Trap Bar to prove to y'all how good a companion it can be. It is a one life time buy and I'm very happy with my new professional equipment : )
customer_reviews.author: TRANSCENDENT LLC

customer_reviews.title: Super strong and works well.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for hubby's home gym room. Package was delayed and I had to call to find out when I would get it. The UPS guy finally came and didn't even want to deliver it as the packaging was so damaged. The actual item was okay but it is a miracle as badly as box was damaged. I would suggest better packaging. However, the hex bar is okay and exactly what hubby wanted so all is good. This item is heavy so be prepared.
customer_reviews.author: R. J. Dixon

customer_reviews.title: Solid Trap Bar
customer_reviews.text: Wasnt sure what to expect when getting gym equipment from amazon. Received it a week ago and this things is legit was very surprised. Very sturdy, paint looks good, grip is nice. No complaints . However........ The only downside of this it the sleeve length. Depending on how much you load and plate size, With 9 inch the bar can only hold so much. This is only a problem on the size of your plates or if you want to really load the bar up. Most trap bars are 17 inch. Still worth the purchase just important to know for future lifts.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher

customer_reviews.title: Solid bar for deadlifts and squats
customer_reviews.text: The hex bar arrived in good shape, the packaging was not damaged and the wood structure inside helps protect it. There was an excessive amount of oil all over the bar, not sure why. So far I have used it for dead lifts and it is excellent, very solid and plenty of room inside. The price I paid was jacked up higher than normal as Amazon was taking advantage of the pandemic to milk more profit from customers so not super pleased about that, but overall it's a good purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Ross Martin Photography

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy well made bar that fits the plates perfectly
customer_reviews.text: Ok, the handles are a bit to cheesegrater like for my taste but you won't lose your grip. The Olympic plates fit perfectly. I especially love the fact that it arrived without any packaging material at all. Not only is that less waste but it shows that they now they built a quality product that needs no protection.
customer_reviews.author: Rick Culleton

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality bar
customer_reviews.text: This bar is great, very nice quality. I only take away 1 star because I wish the sleeves were longer. I lift with bumper plates, and I can only fit 3 plates on each side, without a collar (2+ plates with a collar).
customer_reviews.author: mp

customer_reviews.title: For the cost, very good
customer_reviews.text: Packaging was perfect; arrived with no issues. Sleeves are good length. Finish is resilient. Construction / welds appear to be very solid.
customer_reviews.author: Amy & Joe

customer_reviews.title: Good bar
customer_reviews.text: Well it just came in a plastic bag but I love it. The Collars are short so if you have bumpers or wide steel plates you wont be able to load 400 or 500 pounds. I have comp kilos so I can get 700 easy. The grip is great you dont need straps and it pulls very easy.
customer_reviews.author: Shaun

customer_reviews.title: Back problems? Want to deadlift without pain? Try a trap bar
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Exactly as I expected. Well packaged for shipping and great for trap bar deadlifts. Extremely helpful as I have a compressed disc in my back and heavy deadlifts with a standard bar always seem to cause pain. This allows me to lift heavy with no pain.
customer_reviews.author: Hollywood711

customer_reviews.title: so happy with this purchase
customer_reviews.text: i'm a body builder and I've been looking for any kind of bar to put in my home gym. settle on this one and i'm happy with it. they delivered quickly. fits the standard 2' plates. they even have an ig where they will repost. so win all around for me @ht_physique FOLLOW ME!!
customer_reviews.author: HT

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely what I was looking for. Professional weight and gym quality
customer_reviews.author: Denise98

customer_reviews.title: Great narrower width grips, aggressive knurling though
customer_reviews.text: Great product hard to find a more narrow width between handles fits me perfect I’m 5 7. Knurling is most aggressive I’ve used though. With heavy deads I bleed. Athletic tape should fix that easily.
customer_reviews.author: Meow

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: Got exactly what was advertised and on time, which is especially great considering strength equipment is so hard to come by these days
customer_reviews.author: louisvilleguy

customer_reviews.title: Great hexbar!
customer_reviews.text: This is as good as my gym's hexbar. It weighs 50 lbs and is heavy without added weight and a good warmup to doing hex bar squats.
customer_reviews.author: Felicia V

customer_reviews.title: A brute of a bar
customer_reviews.text: Poor packaging that did not survive the trip, but very well made with nice welds. No damage even though it destroyed the packing it was sent in. I am using it for the farmers carry and squats. Very happy with the purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Shaw

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: It does what it's supposed to do. Heavy. I load 450lb on it so I think it works.
customer_reviews.author: TheOC

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Well built and the perfect size for a small home gym. The bar holds fewer plates than the full size gym model yet feels just as heavy.
customer_reviews.author: Brigette Gordon

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what ya need
customer_reviews.text: the bar itself is heavy. The packaging was really F'd up, but still made it to my house. Gets the job done!
customer_reviews.author: Kareem

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I wanted in a trap bar. Very well made and worth the money
customer_reviews.author: Brandon

customer_reviews.title: Quality product
customer_reviews.text: Quality product for the price and shipping was fast. I would recommend this product.100% satisfied.👌
customer_reviews.author: joshua thomas

customer_reviews.title: Solid product
customer_reviews.text: The packaging was a little dinged up but the bar looks undamaged. It also looks very sturdy and the welds look solid. Overall great product for the price.
customer_reviews.author: William Kavanaugh

customer_reviews.title: Great Bar - Well made
customer_reviews.text: Arrived - well made Does the truck - very sturdy heavy construction
customer_reviews.author: Thomas C. Weston

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Haven't had any issues at all. It rings like a tuning fork when you hit it on things. The knurling is pretty aggressive too.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quality bar at an affordable price.
customer_reviews.text: Quality bar at an affordable price. Sunny is the only distributor that will ship to Hawaii!
customer_reviews.author: James Bond

customer_reviews.title: Great to my workout!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect! Fast shipping! Shipped to Puerto Rico without any problem. Better than expected to my workout!
customer_reviews.author: Fernando Osorio

customer_reviews.title: Hex bar
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely perfect! Better for my lower back when doing squats and very durable!
customer_reviews.author: Joseph  lewis

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent piece of equiptment! Exactly what i was looking for
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: great quality
customer_reviews.text: This product is a great value and investment for my home gym
customer_reviews.author: smeszaros

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: it's so pretty but the chrome ends up all over the floor like a Unicorn exploded.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy

customer_reviews.title: Got to have it
customer_reviews.text: I love it, takes a way the concern for lower back injuries. Gives new options in change up or workout routines. Happy with purchase.
customer_reviews.author: alvin norris

customer_reviews.title: HEX IT UP!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is solid and will give me YEARS of use! For those of you building a home gym it’s a must have!
customer_reviews.author: Carlos Gonzalez

product_meta.title: Sunny Health & Fitness Olympic Hex Bar, Medium
product_meta.description: Build power, strength, and muscle with the Sunny Health and Fitness HEX bar. This bar provides a safer, more efficient way to perform dead-lifts. Its all about center of gravity and having mechanical advantage, the bar allows for optimal positioning of the head, back, hands and arms to perform squats like a champ, while reducing the amount of strain on the knees hip and back. The handles are diamond knurled for a solid grip and comfort. The ample 9.5" of loadable sleeve space makes this bar versatile in any strength program. You can work it hard and keep it safe with Sunny Health and Fitness OB HEX bar! Triple extension baby!
feature_bullets: Handles 22.5" on center | 6" from floor to center of handle
Diamond knurled handle for secure comfortable grip
